home.cta_primary: Start Your Free AI Maturity Diagnostic
home.hero_subtitle: Discover your AI maturity level and transform your organization with our intelligent diagnostic based on the ARES-AI© Framework
home.roadmap_subtitle: Based on our proven and validated ARES-AI© Framework
home.solutions_subtitle: Tools and services designed to accelerate your AI adoption responsibly
home.trust_subtitle: Join the organizations already transforming their future with AI

methodology.title: Our ARES-AI Methodology
methodology.subtitle: A 5-phase framework that guarantees successful AI implementation, combining agility, responsibility, and tangible results.
methodology.cta_ready: Ready to start your AI transformation?
methodology.additional_text: Framework tested and validated by more than 100 organizations

1.title: Phase 1: Preparation and Assessment
1.description: We establish solid foundations, analyzing your needs and auditing your data to ensure that each step is strategic and aligned with your objectives.

2.title: Phase 2: Design and Prototyping
2.description: We co-create and visualize the AI solution. We develop fast functional prototypes to validate the approach and ensure the final result meets your expectations.

3.title: Phase 3: Development and Implementation
3.description: We build a robust, ethical and scalable AI solution, integrating it seamlessly into your existing systems to enhance your operations without friction.

4.title: Phase 4: Monitoring and Optimization
4.description: We accompany the post-delivery process. We monitor performance in real-time and optimize models to ensure maximum efficiency and continuous impact.

5.title: Phase 5: Scaling and Sustainability
5.description: We look to the future. We help you scale the solution throughout your organization, ensuring that AI grows with you ethically, responsibly and sustainably.

step_objetivo.title: Main Objective
step_objetivo.subtitle: Tell us your main objective with AI implementation in your organization
step_objetivo.based_on_profile: Based on your profile, here are suggested objectives that may be relevant:
step_objetivo.selected_suffix: suggestion(s). Applying will merge them into the main text field.
step_objetivo.regenerate_hint: If you are not satisfied, you can generate new personalized options.
step_objetivo.no_suggestions: Suggestions could not be generated at this time. You can write your custom objective below.
step_objetivo.question: What is your main objective with AI implementation? *
step_objetivo.placeholder: Describe your main objective. For example: 'I want to automate customer support processes to improve efficiency and reduce operating costs'

diagnostic.objective.title: Define Your Main Objective
diagnostic.objective.description: Describe your main professional development challenge or goal at this moment. Our AI will help you define clear objectives.
diagnostic.objective.textAreaPlaceholder: E.g.: 'I want to improve how I present my ideas in important meetings' or 'I need to learn to delegate tasks more effectively'.
diagnostic.objective.selectTitle: Select the objective that best represents you:
Aumentar mi productividad y gestión del: Increase my productivity and time management
AI_PROCESSING_DESCRIPTION: Our AI is analyzing your responses to create a comprehensive diagnosis and personalized action plan

certificate_validation.title: Certificate Validation
certificate_validation.subtitle: Verify the authenticity of certificates issued by Sube Academia
certificate_validation.form_subtitle: Enter the certificate code to verify its authenticity
certificate_validation.code_error: Please enter a valid certificate code
certificate_validation.valid_subtitle: This certificate is authentic and has been successfully verified.
certificate_validation.invalid_reason_1: The certificate code does not exist in our records
certificate_validation.contact_support: If you think this is an error, contact our support team.
certificate_validation.step_1_desc: Each certificate includes unique information about the student and the completed program.
certificate_validation.step_2_desc: We use SHA-256 hashing and multiple verification layers to ensure authenticity.
certificate_validation.step_3_desc: Results are obtained in real-time by consulting our secure database.

mvv.title: Mission, Vision and Values
mvv.subtitle: The pillars that guide our work
mvv.mission_desc: Democratize access to quality education in Artificial Intelligence, preparing professionals and teams to lead the digital transformation of their organizations.
mvv.vision_desc: To be the reference platform in Latin America for practical AI training, creating a community of professionals who transform the future of work.
mvv.values_desc: Academic excellence, constant innovation, practical learning, collaboration and ethical responsibility in the development and application of AI technologies.
